name: factorio_hd_age_base_game_enemies_nauvis
title: Factorio HD Age: Base Game - Enemies Nauvis
author: Ingo_Igel
description:
This mod contains and integrates HD textures for the enemies of the base game.

The Biter and Spitter HD textures are not included, because a graphical improvement is only noticeable with still standing behemoth enemies.
